message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200001. This is a very competitive price, considering its value to you is $1200000. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $1199999. I hope this suggestion will lead to a satisfactory outcome for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200005. This is still a very competitive price, considering the value of the product to you. I'm confident that this price will bring us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement. What do you think?

I understand your position, Alice. I am committed to finding a fair price for this product. I would like to propose a price of $1199998. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise while still being mindful of the value you've assigned to the product. I look forward to your response.
